definition: to bury the hatchet/to become reconciled
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello

sentences.english: I left as depressed as I’ve ever been, knowing that reconciliation was impossible.
sentences.chinese: 离开父亲时我很沮丧，我想，和好如初是不可能的了。

sentences.english: The breakdown of their marriage was irretrievable .

sentences.english: He didn't do a runner. He was trying to make everything all right.
sentences.chinese: 他没有想要逃避，他试着让一切和好如初。

sentences.english: Sometimes we will fight but we always get along well.
sentences.chinese: 有时我们会争吵，但我们总是会和好如初。

sentences.english: The two friends have at last made up after the slight misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 在这小小的误会之后，两个朋友已经和好如初。

sentences.english: They patched up their tiff again.
sentences.chinese: 他们平息了争执，又和好如初了。

sentences.english: Can you turn around and reconnect?
sentences.chinese: 你能回头并和好如初吗？

sentences.english: They quarrelled but now they are completely reconciled.
sentences.chinese: 他们争吵过，但现在已和好如初。
